sapia:sect-desc.p: Sapia aims at providing quality open-source software to the developer community. We are adepts of lightweight and agile; we strive for modularity, reusability, elegance. We also think that good documentation is a must, and go to great lengths to make sure that all projects we publish are thoroughly documented.
Through the years, we ourselves, as developers of solutions, have benefited from open source software. Sapia is a modest attempt at giving back.
